name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Python Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience specializing in building scalable solutions leveraging **Python**, **Flask**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and databases such as **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL**. Proficient in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and containerization strategies using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, while maintaining code quality through peer **Code Review** and solid **Testing Principles**.

Experienced in cloud environments, particularly with **AWS**, utilizing tools like **Terraform** for infrastructure management. I excel in performance monitoring and logging utilizing **Grafana**, **ELK Stack**, and **New Relic**, ensuring reliability and transparency in systems deployed in production.

I possess strong technical communication skills, adept at collaboration through tools like **JIRA**, **Confluence**, **Slack**, and **Miro**. My background also includes hands-on experience in implementing event-driven architectures and messaging systems with **RabbitMQ** and **Redis**. I have led teams towards achieving compliance standards and have a passion for mentoring newer engineers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.
